name: Minh Vu

responsibilities: Built an OpenAI-powered job application system with React and SpringBoot, autofilling 750+ jobs daily.
Utilized SupaBase and MongoDB for efficient data storage, managing 70,000+ entries with high availability.
Integrated Fire Crawler and PuppeteerJS to automate job postings retrieval, enhancing job matching precision.
Implemented CI/CD and A/B testing on Vercel for deployment, ensuring 99.9% uptime during peak user access.
Led an AngularJS-TypeScript website for the Japanese Pharmacists Association, servicing 500-1000 daily visits.
Enhanced JavaScript SDK with Observer pattern, automating data binding for 20,000 entries at 98% accuracy.
Managed fast-paced development cycles in an Agile-Scrum environment, improving project delivery by 20%.
Deployed Microsoft's GraphRAG to improve sociological documentation with a 30% increase in F1 score.
Enhanced search accuracy by 25% using Solr and SBERT, optimizing property retrieval for corporate users.
Instructed 1,500+ students in Computer Science topics, contributing to their academic success.
Facilitated learning in DSA, Web Programming, and Machine Learning, mentoring diverse student groups.

personal_projects.title: CloudCueAI
description: Architected a real-time interview language tool with AWS Lambda and Flask, improving communication skills.
Used Amazon Transcribe for voice data processing, delivering immediate feedback on word suggestions.
Stored transcriptions securely in S3 and monitored deployments via CloudWatch for reliability.

personal_projects.title: Beatcode
description: Developed a scalable LeetCode game platform with FastAPI, engaging 500+ players during beta phases.
Optimized Docker and WebSocket for smooth user experience, supporting over 1,000 concurrent users.
Leveraged PostgreSQL and OpenAI for performance analytics, boosting code acceptance rates by 18%.

personal_projects.title: OhEss
description: Engineered a Windows 10 OS replica with React and TypeScript, achieving 100% SEO score in Lighthouse.
Incorporated Kolibri and Linux apps in NextJS on Vercel, managing in-browser file services for 200+ users.

personal_projects.title: Sculpt AI
description: Devised 3D modeling for Metaverse with AI, reducing manual modeling time by 30% using OpenCV and Blender.
Implemented MediaPipe for dynamic pose tracking, achieving 85% success rate in real-time environments.

Libraries/Frameworks: MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, AngularJS, SpringBoot, Docker, SQL, Supabase, PouchDB
